description: Activate or deactivate a plot. If a plot is inactive, nothing is rendered in the window except a message indicating as much. By default a plot is active. If an error occurs during rendering, the plot will be automatically deactivated to prevent the error from reoccurring on each screen refresh.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Plot name. If not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: b
keywords.description: Boolean flag: true to activate, false to deactivate the plot.

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot <name> active <bool>') - no direct Python SDK method
